code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'./api';import'./EducatorPreview.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EducatorPreview(){const{educator_id}=useParams();const[educatorDetails,setEducatorDetails]=useState(null);const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetchEducatorDetails();});async function fetchEducatorDetails(){try{const educatorResponse=await api.get(`/educator-preview/${educator_id}`);const{data:educatorData}=educatorResponse;setEducatorDetails(educatorData.educator);setCourses(educatorData.courses);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching educator details:',error);}}if(!educatorDetails){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"educator-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:educatorDetails.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:educatorDetails.profile_picture,alt:educatorDetails.name,className:"educator-photo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"About "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),educatorDetails.bio]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"course-list",children:["Courses by ",educatorDetails.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"educator-course-cards",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"educator-course-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:course.course_thumbnail_url,alt:course.course_name,onClick:()=>navigate(`/course-preview/${course.course_id}`)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"educator-course-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{onClick:()=>navigate(`/course-preview/${course.course_id}`),children:course.course_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",course.course_price]})]})]}))})]});}export default EducatorPreview;
